```{python}
import pandas as pd
import plotly.express as px 
import itables
```

## India TB Pathways
The India TB Pathways dataset is based on a study conducted in Vellore district, Tamil Nadu, India. It
examines the pre-diagnostic costs and health-seeking behavior of 880 new adult pulmonary tuberculosis
patients registered at Primary Health Centres (PHCs).


```{python}
data = pd.read_csv("india_tb_pathways_and_costs.csv")

itables.show(data)
```

![Map of Tamil Nadu. Vellore district is in the north-east](images/tndistrict_1.png)

## Relationship between employment status and BMI

This plot shows that those who are employed tend to have a higher BMI in the Vellore district of India.


```{python}
px.box(data, x="bmi", y="Employment")
```
